name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Talking to the Moon: Dreamy Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Escape into a world of tranquility with the *Talking to the Moon* live wallpaper for Chrome!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This enchanting live wallpaper features a serene scene of a glowing moon in the night sky, with soft, gentle animations that create a peaceful, dreamy atmosphere. As the moon illuminates the night, the calming visuals add a touch of magic and serenity to your browser, perfect for anyone who loves quiet, ethereal settings.

Along with the beautiful animation, popular site shortcuts for easy navigation, and a real-time date and time display. Download now and let the peaceful glow of the moon transform your Chrome experience!
